mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
surname Shan
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
west
Shanxi province (Shansi) in north China between Hebei and Shaanxi, abbr. 晋 capital Taiyuan 太原
Shanxi University
Shansitherium fuguensis (early giraffe)

sentences.english: Shanxi College graduate, deputy chief physician.
sentences.chinese: 山西中醫學院畢業，副主任醫師。

sentences.english: Wutai Mountain located at Shanxi Province northeast within the boundaries of Wutai County.
sentences.chinese: 五臺山位於山西省東北部五臺縣境內。

sentences.english: Most customers are from Shanxi and Erduosi (Inner Momgolia).
sentences.chinese: 大多數客戶來自山西及內蒙鄂爾多斯。

sentences.english: Finally, the Shanxi mature vinegar poured into the old, will cover the storage cap.
sentences.chinese: 最後把山西老陳醋倒入，將瓶蓋蓋好存放。

sentences.english: Fox conflicts over religion in many parts of Shanxi Province, in particular, is especially prevalent in Jinzhong.
sentences.chinese: 狐突信仰遍及山西許多地區，特別是在晉中尤爲盛行。

sentences.english: Purple garlic of Ying county is famous with its quality.
sentences.chinese: 山西省應縣的紫皮大蒜在國內久負盛名。

sentences.english: Analysis on the higher education on tourism thoroughly, this paper points out a few of measurements to it.
sentences.chinese: 當前山西旅遊高等教育難以適應旅遊經濟的快速發展。

sentences.english: Yuanqu county located at the south of Shanxi province, the northeast of Yuncheng .
sentences.chinese: 垣曲縣位於山西省南端，運城地區東北隅。

sentences.english: In Shansi province two storey and one and a half storey houses are typical.
sentences.chinese: 在山西省，典型的住房是兩層和一層半。

sentences.english: Collapse of mined-out area in coal mines is the chief geologic disaster in Shanxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 煤礦採空塌陷是山西省地質災害的主要災種。

sentences.english: Answers were provided by Shanxi Hengtian New Textile Fiber Tech Co. Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 答案由山西恆天紡織新纖維科技有限公司提供。

sentences.english: Wang Jiwen was born in Xin'zhuang Village, Jicheng, Shanxi province in 1934.
sentences.chinese: 王吉文，1934年出生于山西省翼城縣辛莊村。

sentences.english: The paper starts on taking the case of Anchang village, outskirts of Changzhi in Shanxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 本文以山西省長治市郊區安昌村爲例展開論述。

sentences.english: The resources of entomogenous fungi in Shanxi Province were studied.
sentences.chinese: 對山西省蟲生真菌的種類資源概貌進行了總結。

sentences.english: After the overthrow of the Qing dynasty, Shanxi was held by warlord Yan Xishan.
sentences.chinese: 清朝被推翻後，山西被軍閥閻錫山佔領。

sentences.english: Highway has contributed greatly toe conomic development in Shanxi.
sentences.chinese: 公路爲山西省經濟發展做出巨大的貢獻。

definition: Shandong, province in northeast China, short name 魯|鲁[Lu3], capital Jinan 濟南|济南[Ji3 nan2]

Jilin province (Kirin) in northeast China, abbr. 吉, capital 長春|长春/also Jilin prefecture-level city, Jilin province
Liaoning province in northeast China, short name 遼|辽[Liao2], capital Shenyang 瀋陽|沈阳[Shen3 yang2]
Tianjin, a municipality in northeast China, abbr. 津
Henan province (Honan) in central China, abbr. 豫, capital Zhengzhou 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
Hebei province (Hopeh) in north China surrounding Beijing, short name 冀, capital Shijiazhuang 石家莊|石家庄[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1]
Gansu province, abbr. 甘[Gan1], short name 隴|陇[Long3], capital Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1]
Jiangsu province (Kiangsu) in southeast China, abbr. 蘇|苏, capital Nanjing 南京
Taiyuan prefecture level city and capital of Shanxi province 山西省 in central north China
Linfen prefecture-level city in Shanxi 山西
Shanxi province (Shansi) in north China between Hebei and Shaanxi, abbr. 晋 capital Taiyuan 太原
Jinzhong prefecture-level city in Shanxi 山西
Beijing, capital of People's Republic of China/Peking/PRC government
